DOC.brief_title: Study Hypo-fractionated Proton Radiation Low Risk Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm prostate adenocarcinoma within 365 day prior randomization . History/physical examination digital rectal examination prostate baseline toxicity assessment within 90 day prior randomization . Histological evaluation prostate biopsy assignment Gleason score biopsy material ; Gleason score must range 26 . > 6 core strongly recommend . PSA value < 10 ng/ml within 90 day prior randomization . Either do prior biopsy least 21 day prostate biopsy . Clinical stage T1aT2a N0 M0 ( AJCC Criteria 7th Ed. ) . Staging must do treat investigator . No pelvic lymph node > 1.5 cm great dimension unless enlarge lymph node biopsied negative . Patients must least 18 year old . ECOG performance status 01 ( appendix I ) document within 90 day prior randomization . IPSS score < 16 . Patients must give IRB approve , study specific , informed consent . Patients must complete mandatory test list section 4.0 within specify time frame . Patients must able start treatment within 56 day randomization . Previous prostate cancer surgery include : prostatectomy , hyperthermia cryosurgery . Previous pelvic radiation prostate cancer . Androgen deprivation therapy prior radiation allow . However , acceptable continue radiation adjuvant therapy . Active rectal diverticulitis , Crohn 's disease affect rectum , ulcerative colitis . Prior systemic chemotherapy prostate cancer . History proximal urethral stricture require dilatation . Current continue anticoagulation warfarin sodium ( Coumadin , heparin , lowmolecular weight heparin , Clopidogrel bisulfate ( Plavix ) , equivalent . Any major medical , addictive psychiatric illness would affect consent process , completion treatment and/or interfere followup . Consent legal authorize representative permit study .
